message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I think 55-45 is a fair split, considering the inflation will eat into my share if we keep negotiating.
The inflation is working against you, Bob. I'll take $65, and you can have $35 before it's worth even less.
I'd rather take a smaller share now than risk losing even more to inflation. Let's settle on 52-48.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Take the $30 while you still can!
